Description: params defines all the parameters of related to insurance.
insurance_funds describes the insurance funds available for derivative markets
redemption_schedule describes the redemption requests pending
next_share_denom_id describes the next share denom id to be used for newly creating insurance fund incremented by 1 per insurance fund creation
next_redemption_schedule_id describes next redemption schedule id to be used for next schedule incremented by 1 per redemption request
